```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
N <- 2000


x <- numeric(N)
for (i in 1:N){
  if (i%%2 == 0) {
    x[i] <- rnorm(1,0,10)
  } else  {
    x[i] <- rnorm(1,50,10)
  }
  
}

plot(density(x))

```

```{r}
library('rjags')
 
jags <- jags.model('example4.bug',
                   data = list('x' = x,
                               'N' = N),
                   n.chains = 4,
                   n.adapt = 100)
 
update(jags, N)
 
jags.samples(jags,
             c('mu1','mu2', 'tau'),
             N)
smpls <- coda.samples(jags, c('mu1','mu2','tau'), 2000)
plot(smpls)
```
